content.title: 'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' DLC: 'Persona 5' Character Coming In First Challenge Pack - Forbes
content.desc: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate just released on December 7 for the Nintendo Switch, but we’ve already learned about the first piece of DLC. As a part of the Challenger 1 Pack, Joker from the Persona 5 franchise will be added to the game. Joker in SSBU This announcement was made and revealed at the 2018 Video Game Awards in Los Angeles on Thursday night. Here is a look at the trailer: clearly, we wish there was a snippet of gameplay with Joker and/or on his stage, but based on the early reviews of SSBU, we’d be inclined to expect a solid and imaginative rendering. This is a significant add for S...

content.title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate review | A riotous fighter and gloriously bonkers video game celebration - The Telegraph
content.desc: Nearly twenty years after the first Super Smash Bros, the core appeal of Nintendo’s raucous fighter remains the same: being able to give Pikachu a good shoeing. Or using Donkey Kong to ground Fox McCloud by headbutting him into the dirt. Or allowing Princess Peach her ultimate revenge, belting Bowser into the stratosphere using a baseball bat. But in contrast to the ability for Nintendo characters to impart cartoonish violence on one another, Super Smash Bros. is also a celebration. A party to which anyone or anything that has graced a Nintendo console is invited, and the entertainment is a...

content.title: 'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' Release Date And 10 Things You Should Know Before You Buy The Game - Forbes
content.desc: As Nintendo Switch exclusives go, there aren’t many that are more valuable than the upcoming Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. SSBU for Nintendo Switch This iconic series has rarely produced a dud and with more characters than ever, expectations are high for yet another noteworthy achievement. SSBU releases on December 7 and here are the 10 things you should know about the final major video game release of 2018. content.title: How To Download A User-Created 'Super Smash Bros' Ultimate' Instruction Manual - Forbes
content.desc: Back in the day, even the most self-explanatory video games shipped with a manual. That time has passed and the most you’ll get these days is an in-game menu with all of the commands. SSBU user-created manual The upcoming Super Smash Bros. Ultimate is no different, but that just wasn’t acceptable for OharaLibrarianArtur (h/t Kotaku). These Redditors created their own high-quality instruction manual and they uploaded it for anyone to print if needed. When I say high quality, I’m not just blowing smoke. Take a look at these images of the manual: Sample page from user-created SSBU manual Sampl...

content.title: 'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' Release Date And Special Edition Info: Which Version Should You Buy? - Forbes
content.desc: One of the most iconic Nintendo titles and most-anticipated games of the year on the Switch is almost here. Super Smash Bros. Ultimate is set to release on December 7. SSBU for Nintendo Switch It boasts a massive roster of characters–74 to be exact. I’ll break down the 10 things you need to know about the game later in the week, but for now, let’s look at the different versions available and find out which one is right for you.
